00021 template<typename T>
00022 class Vector {
00023 public:
00024     friend class Iterator;
00025     typedef INT DifferenceType;
00026     typedef T ValueType;
00027     typedef T& Reference;
00028     typedef const T& ConstReference;
00029     typedef INT SizeType;
00030 
00031     enum {
00032         c_increment = 5
00033     };
00034 
00036     class Iterator {
00037     protected:
00038         friend class Vector<T>;
00039 
00040         Vector<T> *owner;
00041         SizeType current;
00042 
00043         Iterator(Vector<T> *daddy, SizeType i) :
00044             owner(daddy), current(i) { }
00045         Iterator(const Vector<T> *daddy, SizeType i) :
00046             owner((Vector<T> *)daddy), current(i) { }
00047 
00048     public:
00054         Iterator& operator++(INT) {
00055             ++current;
00056             return(*this);
00057         }
00058 
00064         Iterator& operator--(INT) {
00065             --current;
00066             return(*this);
00067         }
00068 
00070 #if !defined(_MSC_VER) || (defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1300))
00071         Iterator operator+(DifferenceType n) const;
00072 #else
00073         Iterator operator+(DifferenceType n) const {
00074             Iterator i(*this);
00075             i.current += n;
00076             return(i);
00077         }
00078 #endif
00079 
00081 #if !defined(_MSC_VER) || (defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1300))
00082         Iterator operator-(DifferenceType n) const;
00083 #else
00084         Iterator operator-(DifferenceType n) const {
00085             Iterator i(*this);
00086             i.current -= n;
00087             return(i);
00088         }
00089 #endif
00090 
00092         Reference operator*() { return(owner->operator[](current)); }
00093 
00095         ConstReference operator*() const
00096             { return(owner->operator[](current)); }
00097 
00099         BOOLEAN operator<(const Iterator &i) const
00100             { return(current < i.current); }
00101 
00103         BOOLEAN operator>(const Iterator &i) const
00104             { return(current > i.current); }
00105 
00107         BOOLEAN operator<=(const Iterator &i) const
00108             { return(current <= i.current); }
00109 
00111         BOOLEAN operator>=(const Iterator &i) const
00112             { return(current >= i.current); }
00113 
00115         BOOLEAN operator==(const Iterator &i) const
00116             { return(current == i.current && owner == i.owner); }
00117 
00119         BOOLEAN operator!=(const Iterator &i) const
00120             { return(!(*this == i)); }
00121 
00123         DifferenceType operator+(const Iterator &i)
00124             { return(current + i.current); }
00125 
00127         DifferenceType operator-(const Iterator &i)
00128             { return(current - i.current); }
00129     };
00130 
00131     typedef const Iterator ConstIterator;
00132     typedef Iterator ReverseIterator;
00133     typedef const Iterator ConstReverseIterator;
00134 
00135 private:
00136     T *m_elem;
00137     SizeType m_nelem;
00138     SizeType m_capacity;
00139     Allocator<T> allocator;
00140 
00141     void Set(SizeType i, ConstReference x);
00142 
00143     void Copy(SizeType to, SizeType from) { Set(to, m_elem[from]); }
00144 
00145     void Construct(Reference elem, ConstReference x);
00146     void Destruct(Reference elem);
00147 
00148     void Resize(SizeType n) {
00149         for (SizeType i = 0; i < GetSize(); ++i)
00150             Destruct(m_elem[i]);
00151 
00152         if (Capacity() < n) {
00153             allocator.Free(m_elem);
00154 
00155             m_capacity = ((n - m_capacity) < c_increment) ?
00156                 m_capacity + c_increment : n;
00157 
00158             m_elem = allocator.Alloc(m_capacity);
00159 
00160             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_elem != 0);
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164     void CheckFree(SizeType n) {
00165         if ((GetSize() + n) > Capacity())
00166             Reserve(GetSize() + n);
00167     }
00168 
00169     void CheckFree() {
00170         CheckFree(1);
00171     }
00172 
00173 public:
00177     Vector(SizeType n, ConstReference value);
00178 
00180     Vector() : m_elem(0), m_nelem(0), m_capacity(0) { }
00181 
00185     Vector(SizeType n);
00186 
00188     Vector(const Vector<T> &x) : m_elem(0), m_nelem(0), m_capacity(0)
00189         { *this = x; }
00190 
00192     ~Vector();
00193 
00195     Iterator Begin() const { return(Iterator(this, 0)); }
00196 
00199     Iterator End() const { return(Iterator(this, m_nelem)); }
00200 
00203     ReverseIterator RBegin() const
00204         { return(ReverseIterator(this, m_nelem - 1)); }
00205 
00209     ReverseIterator REnd() const { return(ReverseIterator(this, -1)); }
00210 
00212     SizeType GetSize() const { return(m_nelem); }
00213 
00215     SizeType MaxSize() const { return(SizeType(UINT_MAX / sizeof(T))); }
00216 
00218     BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const { return m_nelem == 0; }
00219 
00222     Reference operator[](SizeType i) {
00223         ASSERT_DEBUG(i >= 0 && i < GetSize());
00224         return(m_elem[i]);
00225     }
00226 
00229     ConstReference operator[](SizeType i) const {
00230         ASSERT_DEBUG(i >= 0 && i < GetSize());
00231         return(m_elem[i]);
00232     }
00233 
00235     Reference Front() {
00236         ASSERT_DEBUG(GetSize() > 0);
00237         return(m_elem[0]);
00238     }
00239 
00241     ConstReference Front() const {
00242         ASSERT_DEBUG(GetSize() > 0);
00243         return(m_elem[0]);
00244     }
00245 
00247     Reference Back() {
00248         ASSERT_DEBUG(GetSize() > 0);
00249         return(m_elem[m_nelem - 1]);
00250     }
00251 
00253     ConstReference Back() const {
00254         ASSERT_DEBUG(GetSize() > 0);
00255         return(m_elem[m_nelem - 1]);
00256     }
00257 
00259     void PushBack(ConstReference x);
00260 
00262     void Insert(const Iterator &pos, ConstReference x);
00263 
00265     void Insert(const Iterator &pos) {
00266         Insert(pos, T());
00267     }

00271

00313 template<typename T>
00314 void Vector<T>::Set(SizeType i, ConstReference x)
00315 {
00316     if (i < GetSize())
00317         operator[](i) = x;
00318     else
00319         Construct(m_elem[i], x);
00320 }
00321 
00322 template<typename T>
00323 void Vector<T>::Construct(Reference elem, ConstReference x)
00324 {
00325     allocator.Construct(&elem, x);
00326 }
00327 
00328 template<typename T>
00329 void Vector<T>::Destruct(Reference elem)
00330 {
00331     allocator.Destruct(&elem);
00332 }

00334 template<typename T>
00335 Vector<T>::Vector(SizeType n, ConstReference value) :
00336     m_elem(0),
00337     m_nelem(0),
00338     m_capacity(0)
00339 {
00340     if (n > 0) {
00341         Reserve(n);
00342         Insert(Begin(), n, value);
00343     }
00344 }
00345 
00346 template<typename T>
00347 Vector<T>::Vector(SizeType n) :
00348     m_elem(0),
00349     m_nelem(0),
00350     m_capacity(0)
00351 {
00352     if (n > 0) {
00353         Reserve(n);
00354         Insert(Begin(), n, T());
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 template<typename T>
00359 Vector<T>::~Vector()
00360 {
00361     for (SizeType i = 0; i < GetSize(); ++i)
00362         Destruct(m_elem[i]);
00363     allocator.Free(m_elem);
00364 }
00365 
00366 template<typename T>
00367 void Vector<T>::PushBack(ConstReference x)
00368 {
00369     CheckFree();
00370     Construct(m_elem[m_nelem], x);
00371     ++m_nelem;
00372 }
00373 
00374 template<typename T>
00375 void Vector<T>::Insert(const Iterator &pos, ConstReference x)
00376 {
00377     SizeType p;
00378 
00379     p = pos.current;
00380     if (p >= GetSize())
00381         PushBack(x);
00382     else {
00383         Reserve(GetSize() + 1);
00384 
00385         SizeType i = GetSize();
00386 
00387         while (i > p) {
00388             Copy(i, i - 1);
00389             --i;
00390         }
00391         Set(i, x);
00392         ++m_nelem;
00393     }
00394 }
00395 
00396 template<typename T>
00397 void Vector<T>::Insert(const Iterator &pos, SizeType n, ConstReference x)
00398 {
00399     if (n == 0)
00400         return;
00401 
00402     Reserve(GetSize() + n);
00403     SizeType p;
00404 
00405     p = pos.current;
00406     if (p < GetSize()) {
00407         SizeType i(m_nelem + n - 1);
00408         SizeType j(m_nelem - 1);
00409 
00410         while (j >= p)
00411             Copy(i--, j--);
00412     }
00413     for (SizeType i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00414         Set(p, x);
00415         ++p;
00416     }
00417     m_nelem += n;
00418 }
00419 
00420 template<typename T>
00421 void Vector<T>::PopBack()
00422 {
00423     ASSERT_DEBUG(GetSize() > 0);
00424 
00425     Destruct(Back());
00426     --m_nelem;
00427 }
00428 
00429 template<typename T>
00430 void Vector<T>::Erase(const Iterator &pos)
00431 {
00432     if (GetSize() <= 0 || pos.current >= GetSize())
00433         return;
00434 
00435     SizeType i = pos.current;
00436     while (i < GetSize() - 1) {
00437         Copy(i, i + 1);
00438         ++i;
00439     }
00440     Destruct(Back());
00441     --m_nelem;
00442 }
00443 
00444 template<typename T>
00445 void Vector<T>::Erase(const Iterator &first, const Iterator &last)
00446 {
00447     if (last <= first)
00448         return;
00449 
00450     SizeType ifirst = first.current;
00451     SizeType ilast = last.current;
00452 
00453     while (ilast < GetSize())
00454         Copy(ifirst++, ilast++);
00455 
00456     SizeType nelem = ilast - ifirst;
00457     while (ifirst < GetSize()) {
00458         Destruct(m_elem[ifirst]);
00459         ++ifirst;
00460     }
00461     m_nelem -= nelem;
00462 }
00463 
00464 template<typename T>
00465 void Vector<T>::Reserve(SizeType n)
00466 {
00467     if (Capacity() >= n)
00468         return;
00469 
00470     SizeType as = ((n - m_capacity) < c_increment) ? m_capacity + c_increment : n;
00471 
00472     T *tmp = allocator.Alloc(as);
00473     ASSERT_DEBUG(tmp != 0);
00474 
00475     for (SizeType i = 0; i < m_nelem; ++i) {
00476         Construct(tmp[i], m_elem[i]);
00477         Destruct(m_elem[i]);
00478     }
00479 
00480     m_capacity = as;
00481     allocator.Free(m_elem);
00482     m_elem = tmp;
00483 }
00484 
00485 template<typename T>
00486 Vector<T>& Vector<T>::operator=(const Vector<T> &from)
00487 {
00488     if (&from == this)
00489         return(*this);
00490 
00491     Resize(from.GetSize());
00492     m_nelem = 0;
00493     for (SizeType i = 0; i < from.GetSize(); ++i)
00494         Construct(m_elem[i], from[i]);
00495 
00496     m_nelem = from.GetSize();
00497     return(*this);
00498 }
